wordpressPost.title: Server Issues/Rebranding
wordpressPost.content:
If you’ve been on the site today you’ll have noticed a bit of downtime and now some changes (although very minor changes)…firstly you’ll notice that every page has a new web address…the reason for this is simple!

For a long time as Stand For Christ has evolved and become a youth work resource the name simply hasn’t reflected the content and to many extents has made it more difficult for people to find.

Secondly we received an e-mail a few days ago saying that our web host would be going out of business at the end of November so today we sorted out some new hosting, altered the geeky settings and moved the site…with this webspace came a free domain so taking advantage of that we rebranded to youthworkresource.com which I hope you’ll agree is far more fitting.

Standforchrist.co.uk will still be active until the end of May 2010 so you’ve got plenty of time to update links and bookmarks…oh and tell people about youthworkresource.com and let us know what you’d like to see on this site

Mark
